Synopsis:
---------
Marine Sergeant Tommy Santoro (James Marsden) thinks he finally broken his past connection with the mafia.However, a mission with the F.B.I. he suddenly returns to his old neighborhood, at the intersection of Tenth Street Wolf.There, his cousin Joey (Giovanni Ribisi) and his brother Vincent (Renfro Bra) have shed the old neighborhood and gangsters have taken over the neighborhood. But now , a tough Sicilian immigrant drug dealer named Luciano threatens to destroy the family of Tommy, who will face the biggest dilemma that a man can imagine, escape his dark past or protect your family even if it is endangering his career and even his own life ...
